text:
@aakashgupta
 The most absurd part? Clawdbot was literally PAYING for Claude API access and driving adoption. This sends a clear message to builders: "Success on our platform = legal risk." OpenAI lets thousands use "GPT" - that's how you build an ecosystem.

yup. even if it acquihire doesn’t happen, plan to just follow peter on the journey. im hooked & appreciate the craft.

always calling it clawdbot tho
你觉得 Clawdbot 在未来的应用场景中会有哪些具体的突破？

To a layperson like me, Clawdbot/Moltbot is the ability to whatsapp your toaster - but quoting Bob Marley: for what, I don't know. 

Every video is about how now you can chat with your calendar, browser, google - but for what?

Everyone now prefers using Moltbot over honestly staring at Claude Code and writing code the old-fashioned way.

Claude Code is still in the IDE acting like a corporate slave: you say “write a function”, it dawdles and gives you a piece, if it doesn’t run you still have to watch

Clawdbot's public skills repo is such a security nightmare, crypto scammers trying to get prompt injections in left and right. Today this 'axiom-agent' skill got thousands of downloads. (PSA do not run skills you haven't read through yourself completely!)
